items.content_html: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching and selective returns, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: No YouTube Yoodle is a lightweight Firefox browser extension that removes the annoying YouTube yoodle banner from the YouTube homepage. Enjoy a cleaner YouTube experience without the distraction of the yoodle banner. Say goodbye to the yoodle with just a few clicks!
items.title: FinnPL/NoYouTubeYoodle: No YouTube Yoodle is a lightweight Firefox browser extension that removes the annoying YouTube yoodle banner from the YouTube homepage. Enjoy a cleaner YouTube experience without the distraction of the yoodle banner. Say goodbye to the yoodle with just a few clicks!

items.content_html: his BMI calculator is a simple and easy-to-use tool that allows you to calculate your BMI in just a few seconds and display it in a clear and concise way. You will also see an image that indicates your BMI category. It is built with React and Tailwind CSS, making it lightweight and responsive.
items.title: chulbulsingh27/BMI-Calculator: his BMI calculator is a simple and easy-to-use tool that allows you to calculate your BMI in just a few seconds and display it in a clear and concise way. You will also see an image that indicates your BMI category. It is built with React and Tailwind CSS, making it lightweight and responsive.
